task.title: Login Using CorrectPassword
task.shortdesc: This topic describes the process for the happy path(straight-forward login), using correct password and captcha.

taskbody.prereq: The end-user must know the password for the login.

step.cmd: Enter the login/ UserId for the Login, This is generally the email ID you have used to create your account.
Enter the password that was set while creating the account.
Enter the captha that appears in the Captcha box.
Press <Enter> Key or click on Login button

taskbody.result: The User will be successfully logged into the portal if the UserId, Password and captcha are correct.
